# Calculate number of runs stock_picking_recalc_pcs_count_cron # need to recalculate pcs_count and reset the control-parameter.
# Retreive params param_strs = env["ir.config_parameter"].get_param( "stock_picking_recalc_pcs_count_control").lstrip("#").split(",")
start = int(param_strs[0]) step = int(param_strs[1]) stop = int(param_strs[2]) # Recalculated if less than 0
# Prepare cronjob last_id = env["stock.picking"].search([],order="id desc", limit=1).id nbr_of_iters = round(last_id / step) +1 if stop == -1: # less than symbols not allowed here stop = last_id
# Set values and start env["ir.config_parameter"].set_param( "stock_picking_recalc_pcs_count_control",",".join( (str(start),param_strs[1],str(stop))))
env.ref('stock_picking_analysis.stock_picking_recalc_pcs_count_cron').numbercall = nbr_of_iters #env.ref('stock_picking_analysis.stock_picking_recalc_pcs_count_cron').active = True
